clarity-english.description: The official and complete lexicon for Clarity English, based on the second edition of the book 'Clarity English: A Language for a Clearer Future'.

abandon.definition: To leave a thing or place permanently.

ability.definition: The power or capacity to do something.

able.definition: Having the power, skill, or means to do something.

above.definition: In or to a higher position than something else.

accept.definition: To consent to receive a thing offered.

accident.definition: An unfortunate incident that happens unexpectedly.

account.definition: A report or description of an event or experience.

activity.definition: A thing that a person or group does or has done.

actor.definition: A person whose profession is acting on the stage, in movies, or on television.

add.definition: To join something to something else so as to increase the size, number, or amount.

address.definition: The particulars of the place where someone lives or an organization is situated.

administration.definition: The management of public affairs; government.

admit.definition: To confess to be true or to be the case.

adult.definition: A person who is fully grown or developed.

affect.definition: To have an effect on; make a difference to.

after.definition: In the time following (an event or another period of time).

age.definition: The length of time that a person has lived or a thing has existed.

agency.definition: A business or organization providing a particular service.

agent.definition: A person who acts on behalf of another person or group.

agree.definition: To have the same opinion about something; concur.

agreement.definition: A negotiated and typically legally binding arrangement between parties.

ahead.definition: Further forward in space or time.

air.definition: The invisible gaseous substance surrounding the earth.

all.definition: Used to refer to the whole quantity or extent of a particular group or thing.

along.definition: Moving in a constant direction on (a road, path, or any more or less horizontal surface).

already.definition: Before or by now or the time in question.

although.definition: In spite of the fact that; even though.

analysis.definition: Detailed examination of the elements or structure of something.

and.definition: Used to connect words of the same part of speech, clauses, or sentences.

animal.definition: A living organism that feeds on organic matter.

another.definition: An additional person or thing of the same type as one already mentioned.

answer.definition: A thing said, written, or done to deal with a question, statement, or situation.

any.definition: Used to refer to one or some of a thing or number of things, no matter how much or how many.

appear.definition: To come into sight; become visible or noticeable.

apply.definition: To make a formal application or request.

approach.definition: To come near or nearer to (someone or something) in distance or time.

area.definition: A region or part of a town, a country, or the world.

argue.definition: To give reasons or cite evidence in support of an idea, action, or theory.

arm.definition: Each of the two upper limbs of the human body from the shoulder to the hand.

around.definition: Located or situated on every side.

arrive.definition: To reach a place at the end of a journey or a stage in a journey.

art.definition: The expression or application of human creative skill and imagination.

article.definition: A piece of writing included with others in a newspaper, magazine, or other publication.

as.definition: Used to refer to the function or character that someone or something has.

ask.definition: To say something in order to obtain an answer or some information.

assume.definition: To suppose to be the case, without proof.

at.definition: Expressing location or arrival in a particular place or position.

attack.definition: To take aggressive action against (a place or enemy forces) with weapons or armed force.

attention.definition: Notice taken of someone or something.

attorney.definition: A person appointed to act for another in business or legal matters.

audience.definition: The assembled spectators or listeners at a public event.

author.definition: A writer of a book, article, or report.

authority.definition: The power or right to give orders, make decisions, and enforce obedience.

avoid.definition: To keep away from or stop oneself from doing (something).

away.definition: To or at a distance from a particular place, person, or thing.

back.definition: The rear surface of the human body from the shoulders to the hips.

bad.definition: Of poor quality; inferior or defective.

bag.definition: A flexible container with an opening at the top, used for carrying things.

ball.definition: A solid or hollow spherical or ovoid object that is kicked, thrown, or hit in a game.

bank.definition: A financial establishment that invests money deposited by customers.

bar.definition: A long rigid piece of wood, metal, or similar material.

base.definition: The lowest part or edge of something, especially the part on which it rests or is supported.

beat.definition: To defeat (someone) in a game or other competition.

beautiful.definition: Pleasing the senses or mind aesthetically.

bed.definition: A piece of furniture used for sleep or rest.

before.definition: During the period of time preceding (a particular event or time).

begin.definition: To start; perform or undergo the first part of (an action or activity).

behavior.definition: The way in which one acts or conducts oneself.

behind.definition: At or to the far side of (something), typically so as to be hidden by it.

believe.definition: To accept (something) as true; feel sure of the truth of.

benefit.definition: An advantage or profit gained from something.

best.definition: Of the most excellent, effective, or desirable type or quality.

better.definition: Of a more excellent or effective type or quality.

between.definition: At, into, or across the space separating (two objects or regions).

beyond.definition: At or to the further side of.

big.definition: Of considerable size, extent, or intensity.

bill.definition: A printed or written statement of the money owed for goods or services.

billion.definition: The number equivalent to a thousand million.

bit.definition: A small piece, part, or quantity of something.

black.definition: Of the very darkest color owing to the absence of or complete absorption of light.

blood.definition: The red liquid that circulates in the arteries and veins of humans and other vertebrate animals.

blue.definition: Of a color intermediate between green and violet.

board.definition: A long, thin, flat piece of wood or other hard material.

body.definition: The physical structure of a person or an animal.

book.definition: A written or printed work consisting of pages glued or sewn together along one side.

born.definition: Existing as a result of birth.

both.definition: Used to refer to two people or things, regarded and identified together.

box.definition: A container with a flat base and sides, typically square or rectangular and having a lid.

boy.definition: A male child or young man.

break.definition: To separate or cause to separate into pieces as a result of a blow, shock, or strain.

bring.definition: To take or go with (someone or something) to a place.

brother.definition: A man or boy with one or both parents in common with another person.

budget.definition: An estimate of income and expenditure for a set period of time.

build.definition: To construct (something) by putting parts or materials together.

building.definition: A structure with a roof and walls, such as a house or factory.

business.definition: A person's regular occupation, profession, or trade.

but.definition: Used to introduce a phrase or clause contrasting with what has already been mentioned.

buy.definition: To obtain in exchange for payment.

by.definition: Indicating the agent performing an action.

call.definition: To give (someone or something) a particular name.

camera.definition: A device for recording visual images in the form of photographs, film, or video signals.

campaign.definition: An organized course of action to achieve a goal.

cancer.definition: A disease caused by an uncontrolled division of abnormal cells in a part of the body.

candidate.definition: A person who applies for a job or is nominated for election.

capital.definition: The most important city or town of a country or region.

car.definition: A road vehicle, typically with four wheels, powered by an internal combustion engine or electric motor.

card.definition: A piece of thick, stiff paper or thin pasteboard, in particular one used for writing or printing on.

care.definition: The provision of what is necessary for the health, welfare, maintenance, and protection of someone or something.

career.definition: An occupation undertaken for a significant period of a person's life.

carry.definition: To support and move (someone or something) from one place to another.

case.definition: An instance of a particular situation; an example of something occurring.

catch.definition: To intercept and hold (something which has been thrown, propelled, or dropped).

cause.definition: A person or thing that gives rise to an action, phenomenon, or condition.

cell.definition: The smallest structural and functional unit of an organism.

center.definition: The middle point of a circle or sphere.

central.definition: Of, at, or forming the center.

century.definition: A period of one hundred years.

certain.definition: Known for sure; established beyond doubt.

chair.definition: A separate seat for one person, typically with a back and four legs.

challenge.definition: A task or situation that tests someone's abilities.

character.definition: The mental and moral qualities distinctive to an individual.

charge.definition: To demand (an amount) as a price from someone for a service rendered or goods supplied.

check.definition: To examine (something) in order to determine its accuracy, quality, or condition.

child.definition: A young human being below the age of puberty or below the legal age of majority.

choice.definition: An act of selecting or making a decision when faced with two or more possibilities.

choose.definition: To pick out or select (someone or something) as being the best or most appropriate of two or more alternatives.

church.definition: A building used for public Christian worship.

citizen.definition: A legally recognized subject or national of a state or commonwealth.

civil.definition: Relating to ordinary citizens and their concerns.

claim.definition: To state or assert that something is the case, typically without providing evidence or proof.

class.definition: A set or category of things having some property or attribute in common.

clear.definition: Easy to perceive, understand, or interpret.

clearly.definition: In a way that is easy to see, hear, read, or understand.

close.definition: To move (a door or window) so as to cover an opening.

coach.definition: A person who trains an athlete or a team of athletes.

cold.definition: Of or at a low or relatively low temperature.

collection.definition: The action or process of collecting someone or something.

color.definition: The property possessed by an object of producing different sensations on the eye as a result of the way the object reflects or emits light.

come.definition: To move or travel toward or into a place thought of as near or familiar to the speaker.

commercial.definition: Concerned with or engaged in commerce.

common.definition: Occurring, found, or done often; prevalent.

community.definition: A group of people living in the same place or having a particular characteristic in common.

compare.definition: To estimate, measure, or note the similarity or dissimilarity between.

computer.definition: An electronic device for storing and processing data.

condition.definition: The state of something with regard to its appearance, quality, or working order.

consider.definition: To think carefully about (something), typically before making a decision.

consumer.definition: A person who purchases goods and services for personal use.

contain.definition: To have or hold (someone or something) within.

continue.definition: To persist in an activity or process.

control.definition: To determine the behavior or supervise the running of.

cost.definition: An amount that has to be paid or spent to buy or obtain something.

country.definition: A nation with its own government, occupying a particular territory.

couple.definition: Two individuals of the same sort considered together.

course.definition: A direction or route taken or to be taken.

court.definition: A body of people presided over by a judge, judges, or magistrate.

cover.definition: To put something on top of or in front of (something), especially to protect or conceal it.

crime.definition: An action or omission that constitutes an offense that may be prosecuted by the state.

cultural.definition: Relating to the ideas, customs, and social behavior of a society.

culture.definition: The arts and other manifestations of human intellectual achievement regarded collectively.

cup.definition: A small bowl-shaped container for drinking from.

current.definition: Belonging to the present time; happening or being used or done now.

customer.definition: A person who buys goods or services from a shop or business.

data.definition: Facts and statistics collected together for reference or analysis.

daughter.definition: A girl or woman in relation to her parents.

day.definition: Each of the twenty-four-hour periods, reckoned from one midnight to the next.

deal.definition: To distribute (cards) to players in a game.

death.definition: The action or fact of dying or being killed.

debate.definition: A formal discussion on a particular topic.

decide.definition: To come to a resolution in the mind as a result of consideration.

decision.definition: A conclusion or resolution reached after consideration.

deep.definition: Extending far down from the top or surface.

defense.definition: The action of defending from or resisting attack.

degree.definition: The amount, level, or extent to which something happens or is present.

Democrat.definition: An advocate or supporter of democracy.

democratic.definition: Relating to or supporting democracy or its principles.

describe.definition: To give an account in words of (someone or something).

design.definition: To decide upon the look and functioning of (a building, garment, or other object).

despite.definition: Without being affected by; in spite of.

detail.definition: An individual feature, fact, or item.

determine.definition: To cause (something) to occur in a particular way; be the decisive factor in.

develop.definition: To grow or cause to grow and become more mature, advanced, or elaborate.

development.definition: The process of developing or being developed.

difference.definition: A point or way in which people or things are not the same.

different.definition: Not the same as another or each other; unlike in nature, form, or quality.

difficult.definition: Needing much effort or skill to accomplish, deal with, or understand.

dinner.definition: The main meal of the day, taken either around midday or in the evening.

direction.definition: A course along which someone or something moves.

director.definition: A person who is in charge of an activity, department, or organization.

discover.definition: To find unexpectedly or during a search.

discuss.definition: To talk about (something) with another person or group of people.

discussion.definition: The action or process of talking about something in order to reach a decision or to exchange ideas.

disease.definition: A disorder of structure or function in a human, animal, or plant.

do.definition: To perform (an action, the precise nature of which is often unspecified).

doctor.definition: A qualified practitioner of medicine; a physician.

dog.definition: A domesticated carnivorous mammal that typically has a long snout.

door.definition: A hinged, sliding, or revolving barrier at the entrance to a building, room, or vehicle.

down.definition: Toward or in a lower place or position.

draw.definition: To produce (a picture or diagram) by making lines and marks on paper with a pencil, pen, etc.

dream.definition: A series of thoughts, images, and sensations occurring in a person's mind during sleep.

drive.definition: To operate and control the direction and speed of a motor vehicle.

drop.definition: To let or make (something) fall vertically.

drug.definition: A medicine or other substance which has a physiological effect when ingested or otherwise introduced into the body.

during.definition: Throughout the course or duration of (a period of time).

each.definition: Used to refer to every one of two or more people or things, regarded and identified separately.

early.definition: Happening or done before the usual or expected time.

east.definition: The direction toward the point of the horizon where the sun rises at the equinoxes.

easy.definition: Achieved without great effort; presenting few difficulties.

eat.definition: To put (food) into the mouth and chew and swallow it.

economic.definition: Relating to economics or the economy.

economy.definition: The wealth and resources of a country or region.

edge.definition: The outside limit of an object, area, or surface.

education.definition: The process of receiving or giving systematic instruction.

effect.definition: A change which is a consequence or result of an action or other cause.

eight.definition: Equivalent to the sum of seven and one.

either.definition: Used before the first of two (or occasionally more) alternatives that are being specified.

election.definition: A formal and organized choice by vote of a person for a political office or other position.

employee.definition: A person employed for wages or salary.

end.definition: A final part of something, especially a period of time, an activity, or a story.

energy.definition: The strength and vitality required for sustained physical or mental activity.

enjoy.definition: To take delight or pleasure in (an activity or occasion).

enough.definition: As much or as many as is necessary or desirable.

enter.definition: To come or go into (a place).

entire.definition: With no part left out; whole.

environment.definition: The surroundings or conditions in which a person, animal, or plant lives or operates.

environmental.definition: Relating to the natural world and the impact of human activity on its condition.

especially.definition: Used to single out one person, thing, or situation over all others.

establish.definition: To set up (an organization, system, or set of rules) on a firm or permanent basis.

even.definition: Used to emphasize something surprising or extreme.

evening.definition: The period of time at the end of the day, usually from about 6 p.m. to bedtime.

event.definition: A thing that happens, especially one of importance.

every.definition: Used to refer to all the individual members of a set without exception.

evidence.definition: The available body of facts or information indicating whether a belief or proposition is true or valid.

exactly.definition: Used to emphasize the accuracy of a figure or description.

example.definition: A thing characteristic of its kind or illustrating a general rule.

executive.definition: A person with senior managerial responsibility in a business organization.

exist.definition: To have objective reality or being.

expect.definition: To regard (something) as likely to happen.

experience.definition: Practical contact with and observation of facts or events.

expert.definition: A person who has a comprehensive and authoritative knowledge of or skill in a particular area.

explain.definition: To make (an idea, situation, or problem) clear to someone by describing it in more detail.

eye.definition: Each of a pair of globular organs in the head through which people and vertebrate animals see.

face.definition: The front part of a person's head from the forehead to the chin.

fact.definition: A thing that is known or proved to be true.

factor.definition: A circumstance, fact, or influence that contributes to a result or outcome.

fail.definition: To be unsuccessful in achieving one's goal.

fall.definition: To move downward, typically rapidly and freely without control, from a higher to a lower level.

family.definition: A group consisting of parents and children living together in a household.

fast.definition: Moving or capable of moving at high speed.

father.definition: A man in relation to his natural child or children.

fear.definition: An unpleasant emotion caused by the belief that someone or something is dangerous.

federal.definition: Having or relating to a system of government in which several states form a unity but remain independent in internal affairs.

feel.definition: To be aware of (a person or object) through touching or being touched.

field.definition: An area of open land, especially one planted with crops or pasture.

fight.definition: To take part in a violent struggle involving the exchange of physical blows or the use of weapons.

figure.definition: A number, especially one that forms part of official statistics or relates to the financial performance of a company.

fill.definition: To cause (a space or container) to become full or almost full.

film.definition: A story or event recorded by a camera as a set of moving images and shown in a theater or on television; a motion picture.

final.definition: Coming at the end of a series.

finally.definition: After a long time, typically when there has been difficulty or delay.

find.definition: To discover or perceive by chance or unexpectedly.

finger.definition: Each of the four slender jointed parts attached to either hand.

finish.definition: To bring (a task or activity) to an end; complete.

fire.definition: Combustion or burning, in which substances combine chemically with oxygen from the air and typically give out bright light, heat, and smoke.

firm.definition: A business concern, especially one involving a partnership of two or more people.

first.definition: Coming before all others in time or order; earliest; 1st.

fish.definition: A limbless cold-blooded vertebrate animal with gills and fins and living wholly in water.

five.definition: Equivalent to the sum of four and one.

floor.definition: The lower surface of a room, on which one may walk.

fly.definition: To move through the air using wings.

focus.definition: To adapt to the prevailing level of light and become able to see clearly.

follow.definition: To go or come after (a person or thing proceeding ahead); move or travel behind.

food.definition: Any nutritious substance that people or animals eat or drink.

foot.definition: The part of the leg below the ankle, on which a person stands or walks.

for.definition: In support of or in favor of (a person or policy).

force.definition: Strength or energy as an attribute of physical action or movement.

foreign.definition: Of, from, in, or characteristic of a country or language other than one's own.

form.definition: The visible shape or configuration of something.

former.definition: Having previously been a particular thing.

forward.definition: In the direction that one is facing or traveling.

four.definition: Equivalent to the sum of three and one.

free.definition: Able to act or be done as one wishes; not under the control of another.

friend.definition: A person whom one knows and with whom one has a bond of mutual affection.

from.definition: Indicating the point in space at which a journey, motion, or action starts.

front.definition: The side or part of an object that presents itself to view or that is normally seen or used first.

full.definition: Containing or holding as much or as many as possible; having no empty space.

fund.definition: A sum of money saved or made available for a particular purpose.

future.definition: The time or a period of time following the moment of speaking or writing; time regarded as still to come.

game.definition: An activity that one engages in for amusement or fun.

garden.definition: A piece of ground, often near a house, used for growing flowers, fruit, or vegetables.

gas.definition: An airlike fluid substance which expands freely to fill any space available.

general.definition: Affecting or concerning all or most people, places, or things; widespread.

generation.definition: All of the people born and living at about the same time, regarded collectively.

get.definition: To come to have or hold (something); receive.

girl.definition: A female child or young woman.

give.definition: To freely transfer the possession of something to (someone).

glass.definition: A hard, brittle substance, typically transparent or translucent.

go.definition: To move from one place to another; travel.

goal.definition: The object of a person's ambition or effort; an aim or desired result.

good.definition: To be desired or approved of.

government.definition: The governing body of a nation, state, or community.

great.definition: Of an extent, amount, or intensity considerably above the normal or average.

green.definition: Of the color between blue and yellow in the spectrum.

ground.definition: The solid surface of the earth.

group.definition: A number of people or things that are located close together or are considered or classed together.

grow.definition: To undergo natural development by increasing in size and changing physically.

growth.definition: The process of increasing in size.

guess.definition: To estimate or suppose (something) without sufficient information to be sure of being correct.

gun.definition: A weapon incorporating a metal tube from which bullets, shells, or other missiles are propelled by explosive force.

hair.definition: Any of the fine threadlike strands growing from the skin of humans, mammals, and some other animals.

half.definition: Either of two equal or corresponding parts into which something is or can be divided.

hand.definition: The end part of a person's arm beyond the wrist, including the palm, fingers, and thumb.

hang.definition: To suspend or be suspended from above with the lower part dangling free.

happy.definition: Feeling or showing pleasure or contentment.

hard.definition: Solid, firm, and rigid; not easily broken, bent, or pierced.

he.definition: Used to refer to a man, boy, or male animal previously mentioned or easily identified.

head.definition: The upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal.

health.definition: The state of being free from illness or injury.

hear.definition: To perceive with the ear the sound made by (someone or something).

heart.definition: A hollow muscular organ that pumps the blood through the circulatory system.

heat.definition: The quality of being hot; high temperature.

heavy.definition: Of great weight; difficult to lift or move.

help.definition: To make it easier for (someone) to do something by offering one's services or resources.

her.definition: Used as the object of a verb or preposition to refer to a female person or animal previously mentioned.

here.definition: In, at, or to this place or position.

herself.definition: Used as the object of a verb or preposition to refer to a female person or animal that is the subject of the clause.

him.definition: Used as the object of a verb or preposition to refer to a male person or animal previously mentioned.

himself.definition: Used as the object of a verb or preposition to refer to a male person or animal that is the subject of the clause.

his.definition: Belonging to or associated with a male person or animal previously mentioned or easily identified.

history.definition: The study of past events, particularly in human affairs.

hit.definition: To bring one's hand or a tool or weapon into contact with (someone or something) quickly and forcefully.

hold.definition: To grasp, carry, or support with one's arms or hands.

home.definition: The place where one lives permanently.

hope.definition: To want something to happen or be the case.

hospital.definition: An institution providing medical and surgical treatment and nursing care for sick or injured people.

hot.definition: Having a high degree of heat or a high temperature.

hotel.definition: An establishment providing accommodations, meals, and other services for travelers and tourists.

hour.definition: A period of time equal to a twenty-fourth part of a day and night and divided into 60 minutes.

how.definition: In what way or manner; by what means.

however.definition: Used to introduce a statement that contrasts with or seems to contradict something that has been said previously.

hundred.definition: The number equivalent to the product of ten and ten.

i.definition: Used by a speaker to refer to himself or herself.

idea.definition: A thought or suggestion as to a possible course of action.

identify.definition: To establish or indicate who or what (someone or something) is.

image.definition: A representation of the external form of a person or thing in art.

imagine.definition: To form a mental image or concept of.

impact.definition: The action of one object coming forcibly into contact with another.

in.definition: Expressing the situation of something that is or appears to be enclosed or surrounded by something else.

include.definition: To comprise or contain as part of a whole.

including.definition: Containing as part of the whole being considered.

increase.definition: To become or make greater in size, amount, intensity, or degree.

indeed.definition: Used to emphasize a statement or response confirming something already suggested.

individual.definition: A single human being as distinct from a group, class, or family.

industry.definition: Economic activity concerned with the processing of raw materials and manufacture of goods in factories.

information.definition: Facts provided or learned about something or someone.

inside.definition: Situated on or in the interior of.

institution.definition: An organization founded for a religious, educational, professional, or social purpose.

interest.definition: The state of wanting to know or learn about something or someone.

interesting.definition: Arousing curiosity or interest; holding or catching the attention.

international.definition: Existing, occurring, or carried on between two or more nations.

interview.definition: A meeting of people face to face, especially for consultation.

into.definition: Expressing movement or action with the result that someone or something becomes enclosed or surrounded by something else.

investment.definition: The action or process of investing money for profit or material result.

involve.definition: To have or include (something) as a necessary or integral part or result.

issue.definition: An important topic or problem for debate or discussion.

it.definition: Used to refer to a thing previously mentioned or easily identified.

item.definition: An individual article or unit, especially one that is part of a list, collection, or set.

its.definition: Belonging to or associated with a thing previously mentioned or easily identified.

itself.definition: Used as the object of a verb or preposition to refer to a thing or animal previously mentioned as the subject of the clause.

job.definition: A paid position of regular employment.

keep.definition: To have or retain possession of.

key.definition: A small piece of shaped metal with incisions cut to fit the wards of a particular lock.

kill.definition: To cause the death of (a person, animal, or other living thing).

kind.definition: A class or type of people or things having similar characteristics.

kitchen.definition: A room or area equipped for preparing and cooking food.

know.definition: To have knowledge or information of.

knowledge.definition: Facts, information, and skills acquired by a person through experience or education.

land.definition: The part of the earth's surface that is not covered by water.

language.definition: The method of human communication, either spoken or written.

large.definition: Of considerable or relatively great size, extent, or capacity.

last.definition: Coming after all others in time or order; final.

late.definition: Doing something or taking place after the expected, proper, or usual time.

later.definition: At a time in the near future; soon or afterward.

laugh.definition: To make the spontaneous sounds and movements of the face and body that are the instinctive expressions of lively amusement.

law.definition: The system of rules which a particular country or community recognizes as regulating the actions of its members.

lawyer.definition: A person who practices or studies law.

lay.definition: To put down, especially gently or carefully.

lead.definition: To cause (a person or animal) to go with one by holding them by the hand, a halter, a rope, etc.

leader.definition: The person who leads or commands a group, organization, or country.

learn.definition: To gain or acquire knowledge of or skill in (something) by study, experience, or being taught.

least.definition: Smallest in amount, extent, or significance.

left.definition: On, toward, or relating to the side of a human body or of a thing that is to the west when the person or thing is facing north.

leg.definition: Each of the limbs on which a person or animal walks and stands.

less.definition: A smaller amount of; not as much.

let.definition: To not prevent or forbid; allow.

letter.definition: A character representing one or more of the sounds used in speech; any of the symbols of an alphabet.

level.definition: A horizontal plane or line with respect to the distance above or below a given point.

lie.definition: To be in or assume a horizontal or resting position on a supporting surface.

life.definition: The condition that distinguishes animals and plants from inorganic matter.

light.definition: The natural agent that stimulates sight and makes things visible.

like.definition: Having the same characteristics or qualities as; similar to.

likely.definition: Such as well might happen or be the case; probable.

line.definition: A long, narrow mark or band.

list.definition: A number of connected items or names written or printed consecutively.

listen.definition: To give one's attention to a sound.

little.definition: Small in size, amount, or degree.

local.definition: Relating or restricted to a particular area or neighborhood.

long.definition: Measuring a great distance from end to end.

look.definition: To direct one's gaze toward someone or something or in a specified direction.

lose.definition: To be deprived of or cease to have or retain (something).

loss.definition: The fact or process of losing something or someone.

lot.definition: A large number or amount; a great deal.

love.definition: An intense feeling of deep affection.

low.definition: Of less than average height from top to bottom or to the top from the ground.

machine.definition: An apparatus using or applying mechanical power and having several parts, each with a definite function.

magazine.definition: A periodical publication containing articles and illustrations.

maintain.definition: To cause or enable (a condition or state of affairs) to continue.

make.definition: To form (something) by putting parts together or combining substances; construct; create.

manage.definition: To be in charge of (a company, organization, or group of staff).

management.definition: The process of dealing with or controlling things or people.

manager.definition: A person responsible for controlling or administering all or part of a company or similar organization.

market.definition: A regular gathering of people for the purchase and sale of provisions, livestock, and other commodities.

marriage.definition: The legally or formally recognized union of two people as partners in a personal relationship.

material.definition: The matter from which a thing is or can be made.

matter.definition: Physical substance in general, as distinct from mind and spirit.

me.definition: Used by a speaker to refer to himself or herself as the object of a verb or preposition.

mean.definition: To intend to convey, indicate, or refer to (a particular thing or notion); signify.

measure.definition: To ascertain the size, amount, or degree of (something) by using an instrument or device marked in standard units.

media.definition: The main means of mass communication (broadcasting, publishing, and the internet).

medical.definition: Relating to the science or practice of medicine.

meet.definition: To arrange or happen to come into the presence or company of (someone).

meeting.definition: An assembly of people, especially the members of a society or committee, for discussion or entertainment.

member.definition: A person, country, or organization belonging to a group.

memory.definition: The faculty by which the mind stores and remembers information.

mention.definition: To refer to (something) briefly and without going into detail.

message.definition: A verbal, written, or recorded communication sent to or left for a recipient who cannot be contacted directly.

method.definition: A particular form of procedure for accomplishing or approaching something.

middle.definition: The point or position at an equal distance from the sides, edges, or ends of something.

might.definition: Used to express possibility or probability.

military.definition: Relating to or characteristic of soldiers or armed forces.

million.definition: The number equivalent to the product of a thousand and a thousand.

mind.definition: The element of a person that enables them to be aware of the world and their experiences.

minute.definition: A period of time equal to sixty seconds or a sixtieth of an hour.

miss.definition: To fail to hit, reach, or hold (something aimed at).

mission.definition: An important assignment carried out for political, religious, or commercial purposes.

model.definition: A three-dimensional representation of a person or thing or of a proposed structure.

modern.definition: Relating to the present or recent times as opposed to the remote past.

moment.definition: A very brief period of time.

money.definition: A current medium of exchange in the form of coins and banknotes.

month.definition: Each of the twelve named periods into which a year is divided.

more.definition: A greater or additional amount or degree of.

morning.definition: The period of time between midnight and noon, especially from sunrise to noon.

mother.definition: A woman in relation to her child or children.

move.definition: To go in a specified direction or manner; travel.

movement.definition: An act of changing physical location or position.

mr.definition: A title used before a man's surname or full name.

mrs.definition: A title used before a married woman's surname or full name.

music.definition: Vocal or instrumental sounds (or both) combined in such a way as to produce beauty of form, harmony, and expression of emotion.

my.definition: Belonging to or associated with the speaker.

myself.definition: Used by a speaker to refer to himself or herself as the object of a verb or preposition.

name.definition: A word or set of words by which a person, animal, place, or thing is known, addressed, or referred to.

nation.definition: A large body of people united by common descent, history, culture, or language, inhabiting a particular country or territory.

national.definition: Relating to a nation; common to a whole nation.

natural.definition: Existing in or derived from nature; not made or caused by humankind.

nature.definition: The phenomena of the physical world collectively, including plants, animals, the landscape, and other features and products of the earth.

near.definition: At or to a short distance away; nearby.

necessary.definition: Required to be done, achieved, or present; needed; essential.

need.definition: To require (something) because it is essential or very important.

network.definition: A group or system of interconnected people or things.

never.definition: At no time in the past or future; on no occasion; not ever.

new.definition: Produced, introduced, or discovered recently or now for the first time; not existing before.

news.definition: Newly received or noteworthy information, especially about recent or important events.

newspaper.definition: A printed publication consisting of folded unstapled sheets and containing news, articles, advertisements, and correspondence.

next.definition: Coming immediately after the present one in time, order, or space.

night.definition: The period from sunset to sunrise in each twenty-four hours.

nor.definition: Used before the second or further of two or more alternatives (the first being introduced by `neither` or `not`).

north.definition: The direction in which a compass needle normally points, toward the horizon on the left-hand side of a person facing east.

not.definition: Used with an auxiliary verb or `be` to form the negative.

note.definition: A brief record of facts, topics, or thoughts, written down as an aid to memory.

now.definition: At the present time or moment.

number.definition: An arithmetical value, expressed by a word, symbol, or figure.

object.definition: A material thing that can be seen and touched.

obvious.definition: Easily perceived or understood; clear, self-evident, or apparent.

of.definition: Expressing the relationship between a part and a whole.

off.definition: Away from the place in question; to or at a distance.

offer.definition: To present or proffer (something) for someone to accept or reject as so desired.

office.definition: A room, set of rooms, or building used as a place for commercial, professional, or bureaucratic work.

officer.definition: A person holding a position of authority, especially one with a commission, in the armed services, the mercantile marine, or on a passenger ship.

official.definition: Relating to an authority or public body and its duties, actions, and responsibilities.

oh.definition: Used to express a range of emotions including surprise, anger, disappointment, or joy.

oil.definition: A viscous liquid derived from petroleum, especially for use as a fuel or lubricant.

old.definition: Having lived for a long time; no longer young.

on.definition: Physically in contact with and supported by (a surface).

once.definition: On one occasion or for one time only.

one.definition: The lowest cardinal number; half of two.

only.definition: And no one or nothing more besides; solely or exclusively.

onto.definition: Moving to a position on the surface of.

open.definition: Allowing access, passage, or a view through an empty space; not closed or blocked up.

operation.definition: The action of functioning or the fact of being active or in effect.

opportunity.definition: A set of circumstances that makes it possible to do something.

option.definition: A thing that is or may be chosen.

order.definition: The arrangement or disposition of people or things in relation to each other according to a particular sequence, pattern, or method.

organization.definition: An organized body of people with a particular purpose.

other.definition: Used to refer to a person or thing that is different or distinct from one already mentioned or known about.

our.definition: Belonging to or associated with the speaker and one or more other people previously mentioned or easily identified.

out.definition: Moving or appearing to move away from a particular place, especially one that is enclosed or hidden.

outside.definition: Situated or moving beyond the confines or boundaries of.

own.definition: Used with a possessive to emphasize that someone or something belongs or relates to the person or thing mentioned.

page.definition: One side of a sheet of paper in a collection of sheets bound together, especially as a book, magazine, or newspaper.

pain.definition: Highly unpleasant physical sensation caused by illness or injury.

paper.definition: Material manufactured in thin sheets from the pulp of wood or other fibrous substances.

part.definition: An amount or section which, when combined with others, makes up the whole of something.

participant.definition: A person who takes part in something.

particular.definition: Used to single out an individual member of a specified group or class.

particularly.definition: To a higher degree than is usual or average.

partner.definition: A person who takes part in an undertaking with another or others, especially in a business or company with shared risks and profits.

party.definition: A social gathering of a number of people, typically involving eating, drinking, and entertainment.

pass.definition: To move or cause to move in a specified direction.

past.definition: Gone by in time and no longer existing.

patient.definition: A person receiving or registered to receive medical treatment.

pay.definition: To give (someone) money that is due for work done, goods received, or a debt incurred.

people.definition: Human beings in general or considered collectively.

perform.definition: To carry out, accomplish, or fulfill (an action, task, or function).

performance.definition: An act of staging or presenting a play, concert, or other form of entertainment.

perhaps.definition: Used to express uncertainty or possibility.

period.definition: A length or portion of time.

person.definition: A human being regarded as an individual.

personal.definition: Of, affecting, or belonging to a particular person rather than to anyone else.

physical.definition: Relating to the body as opposed to the mind.

pick.definition: To take hold of and move (something) with the fingers.

piece.definition: A part or portion of something.

place.definition: A particular position or point in space.

plan.definition: A detailed proposal for doing or achieving something.

plant.definition: A living organism of the kind exemplified by trees, shrubs, herbs, grasses, ferns, and mosses.

play.definition: To engage in activity for enjoyment and recreation rather than a serious or practical purpose.

player.definition: A person taking part in a sport or game.

point.definition: The tapered, sharp end of a tool, weapon, or other object.

police.definition: The civil force of a state, responsible for the prevention and detection of crime and the maintenance of public order.

policy.definition: A course or principle of action adopted or proposed by a government, party, business, or individual.

political.definition: Relating to the government or public affairs of a country.

politics.definition: The activities associated with the governance of a country or other area.

poor.definition: Lacking sufficient money to live at a standard considered comfortable or normal in a society.

popular.definition: Liked, admired, or enjoyed by many people or by a particular person or group.

population.definition: All the inhabitants of a particular town, area, or country.

position.definition: A place where someone or something is located or has been put.

positive.definition: Consisting in or characterized by the presence or possession of features or qualities rather than their absence.

possible.definition: Able to be done; within the power or capacity of someone or something.

post.definition: A long, sturdy piece of timber or metal set upright in the ground and used to support something or as a marker.

power.definition: The ability to do something or act in a particular way.

practice.definition: The actual application or use of an idea, belief, or method as opposed to theories about such application or use.

prepare.definition: To make (something) ready for use or consideration.

present.definition: To give or award formally or ceremonially.

president.definition: The elected head of a republican state.

pressure.definition: Continuous physical force exerted on or against an object by something in contact with it.

pretty.definition: Attractive in a delicate way without being truly beautiful.

prevent.definition: To keep (something) from happening or arising.

price.definition: The amount of money expected, required, or given in payment for something.

private.definition: For or concerning an individual person or group of people.

probably.definition: Almost certainly; as far as one knows or can tell.

problem.definition: A matter or situation regarded as unwelcome or harmful and needing to be dealt with and overcome.

process.definition: A series of actions or steps taken in order to achieve a particular end.

produce.definition: To make or manufacture from components or raw materials.

product.definition: An article or substance that is manufactured or refined for sale.

production.definition: The action of making or manufacturing from components or raw materials.

professional.definition: Relating to or belonging to a profession.

professor.definition: A teacher of the highest rank in a college or university.

program.definition: A set of related measures or activities with a particular long-term aim.

project.definition: An individual or collaborative enterprise that is carefully planned and designed to achieve a particular aim.

property.definition: A thing or things belonging to someone; possessions collectively.

protect.definition: To keep safe from harm or injury.

prove.definition: To demonstrate the truth or existence of (something) by evidence or argument.

provide.definition: To make available for use; supply.

public.definition: Of or concerning the people as a whole.

pull.definition: To exert force on (someone or something), so as to move them toward oneself or the origin of the force.

purpose.definition: The reason for which something is done or created or for which something exists.

push.definition: To exert force on (someone or something), typically with one's hand, in order to move them away from oneself or from their previous position.

put.definition: To move to or place in a particular position.

quality.definition: The standard of something as measured against other things of a similar kind; the degree of excellence of something.

question.definition: A sentence worded or expressed so as to elicit information.

quick.definition: Moving fast or doing something in a short time.

quite.definition: To the utmost or most absolute extent or degree; absolutely; completely.

race.definition: A competition between runners, horses, vehicles, etc., to see which is the fastest in covering a set course.

radio.definition: The transmission and reception of electromagnetic waves of radio frequency.

raise.definition: To lift or move to a higher position or level.

range.definition: The area of variation between upper and lower limits on a particular scale.

rate.definition: A measure, quantity, or frequency, typically one measured against some other quantity or measure.

rather.definition: Used to express emphatic contradiction or denial.

reach.definition: To stretch out an arm in a specified direction in order to touch or grasp something.

read.definition: To look at and comprehend the meaning of (written or printed matter) by mentally interpreting the characters or symbols of which it is composed.

ready.definition: In a suitable state for an activity, action, or situation; fully prepared.

real.definition: Actually existing as a thing or occurring in fact; not imagined or supposed.

reality.definition: The state of things as they actually exist, as opposed to an idealistic or notional idea of them.

realize.definition: To become fully aware of (something) as a fact; understand clearly.

really.definition: In actual fact, as opposed to what is said or imagined to be true or possible.

reason.definition: A cause, explanation, or justification for an action or event.

receive.definition: To be given, presented with, or paid (something).

recent.definition: Having happened, begun, or been done not long ago or not long before; belonging to a past period of time comparatively close to the present.

recently.definition: At a recent time; not long ago.

recognize.definition: To identify (someone or something) from having encountered them before; know again.

record.definition: A thing constituting a piece of evidence about the past, especially an account of an act or occurrence kept in writing or some other permanent form.

red.definition: Of a color at the end of the spectrum next to orange and opposite violet.

reduce.definition: To make smaller or less in amount, degree, or size.

reflect.definition: To throw back (heat, light, or sound) without absorbing it.

region.definition: An area or division, especially part of a country or the world having definable characteristics but not always fixed boundaries.

relate.definition: To make or show a connection between.

relationship.definition: The way in which two or more concepts, objects, or people are connected, or the state of being connected.

religious.definition: Relating to or believing in a religion.

remain.definition: To continue to exist, especially after other similar or related people or things have ceased to exist.

remember.definition: To have in or be able to bring to one's mind an awareness of (someone or something that one has seen, known, or experienced in the past).

remove.definition: To take (something) away or off from the position occupied.

report.definition: An account given of a particular matter, especially in the form of an official document, after thorough investigation or consideration by an appointed person or body.

represent.definition: To be entitled or appointed to act or speak for (someone), especially in an official capacity.

Republican.definition: A person advocating or supporting republican government.

require.definition: To need for a particular purpose.

research.definition: The systematic investigation into and study of materials and sources in order to establish facts and reach new conclusions.

resource.definition: A stock or supply of money, materials, staff, and other assets that can be drawn on by a person or organization in order to function effectively.

responsibility.definition: The state or fact of having a duty to deal with something or of having control over someone.

rest.definition: To cease work or movement in order to relax, refresh oneself, or recover strength.

result.definition: A consequence, effect, or outcome of something.

return.definition: To come or go back to a place or person.

reveal.definition: To make (previously unknown or secret information) known to others.

rich.definition: Having a great deal of money or assets.

rise.definition: To move from a lower position to a higher one; come or go up.

risk.definition: A situation involving exposure to danger.

road.definition: A wide way leading from one place to another, especially one with a specially prepared surface which vehicles can use.

rock.definition: The solid mineral material forming part of the surface of the earth and other similar planets.

role.definition: An actor's part in a play, movie, etc.

room.definition: Space that can be occupied or where something can be done.

rule.definition: One of a set of explicit or understood regulations or principles governing conduct within a particular activity or sphere.

run.definition: To move at a speed faster than a walk, never having both or all the feet on the ground at the same time.

safe.definition: Protected from or not exposed to danger or risk; not likely to be harmed or lost.

save.definition: To keep safe or rescue (someone or something) from harm or danger.

say.definition: To utter words so as to convey information, an opinion, a feeling or intention, or a question.

scene.definition: The place where an incident in real life or fiction occurs or occurred.

science.definition: The intellectual and practical activity encompassing the systematic study of the structure and behavior of the physical and natural world.

scientist.definition: A person who is studying or has expert knowledge of one or more of the natural or physical sciences.

score.definition: The number of points, goals, runs, etc., achieved in a game or competition.

sea.definition: The expanse of salt water that covers most of the earth's surface and surrounds its landmasses.

season.definition: Each of the four divisions of the year (spring, summer, autumn, and winter) marked by particular weather patterns and daylight hours.

seat.definition: A thing made or used for sitting on, such as a chair or stool.

second.definition: Constituting number two in a sequence; 2nd.

section.definition: Any of the more or less distinct parts into which something is or may be divided or from which it is made up.

security.definition: The state of being free from danger or threat.

see.definition: To perceive with the eyes; discern visually.

seem.definition: To give the impression or sensation of being something or having a particular quality.

sell.definition: To give or hand over (something) in exchange for money.

send.definition: To cause (a letter or package) to be taken or transmitted to a destination.

sense.definition: A faculty by which the body perceives an external stimulus; one of the faculties of sight, smell, hearing, taste, and touch.

series.definition: A number of similar or related events or things, one following another.

serious.definition: Demanding or characterized by careful consideration or application.

serve.definition: To perform duties or services for (another person or an organization).

service.definition: The action of helping or doing work for someone.

set.definition: To put, lay, or stand (something) in a specified place or position.

seven.definition: Equivalent to the sum of six and one.

several.definition: More than two but not many.

sex.definition: Either of the two main categories (male and female) into which humans and most other living things are divided.

sexual.definition: Relating to the instincts, physiological processes, and activities connected with physical attraction or intimate physical contact between individuals.

shake.definition: To move (an object) up and down or from side to side with rapid, forceful, jerky movements.

share.definition: To have a portion of (something) with another or others.

she.definition: Used to refer to a woman, girl, or female animal previously mentioned or easily identified.

shoot.definition: To kill or wound (a person or animal) with a bullet or arrow.

short.definition: Measuring a small distance from end to end.

shot.definition: The firing of a gun or cannon.

should.definition: Used to indicate obligation, duty, or correctness, typically when criticizing someone's actions.

shoulder.definition: The upper joint of the human arm and the part of the body between this and the neck.

show.definition: To allow or cause to be visible.

side.definition: A position to the left or right of an object, place, or central area.

sign.definition: An object, quality, or event whose presence or occurrence indicates the probable presence or occurrence of something else.

significant.definition: Sufficiently great or important to be worthy of attention; noteworthy.

simple.definition: Easily understood or done; presenting no difficulty.

simply.definition: In a straightforward or plain manner.

since.definition: In the intervening period between (the time mentioned) and the time under consideration.

sing.definition: To make musical sounds with the voice, especially words with a set tune.

single.definition: Only one; not one of several.

sister.definition: A woman or girl who has one or both parents in common with another person.

sit.definition: To adopt or be in a position in which one's weight is supported by one's buttocks rather than one's feet.

site.definition: An area of ground on which a town, building, or monument is constructed.

situation.definition: A set of circumstances in which one finds oneself; a state of affairs.

six.definition: Equivalent to the sum of five and one.

size.definition: The relative extent of something; a thing's overall dimensions or magnitude.

skill.definition: The ability to do something well; expertise.

skin.definition: The thin layer of tissue forming the natural outer covering of the body of a person or animal.

small.definition: Of a size that is less than normal or usual.

smile.definition: To form one's features into a pleased, kind, or amused expression.

social.definition: Relating to society or its organization.

society.definition: The aggregate of people living together in a more or less ordered community.

soldier.definition: A person who serves in an army.

some.definition: An unspecified amount or number of.

something.definition: A thing that is unspecified or unknown.

sometimes.definition: Occasionally, rather than all of the time.

son.definition: A boy or man in relation to either or both of his parents.

song.definition: A short poem or other set of words set to music or meant to be sung.

soon.definition: In or after a short time.

sort.definition: A category of people or things having some common feature; a type.

sound.definition: Vibrations that travel through the air or another medium and can be heard when they reach a person's or animal's ear.

source.definition: A place, person, or thing from which something comes or can be obtained.

south.definition: The direction toward the point of the horizon 90 degrees clockwise from east.

southern.definition: Situated in the south or directed toward or facing the south.

space.definition: A continuous area or expanse which is free, available, or unoccupied.

speak.definition: To say something in order to convey information, an opinion, or a feeling.

special.definition: Better, greater, or otherwise different from what is usual.

speech.definition: The expression of or the ability to express thoughts and feelings by articulate sounds.

spend.definition: To pay out (money) in buying or hiring goods or services.

sport.definition: An activity involving physical exertion and skill in which an individual or team competes against another or others for entertainment.

spring.definition: The season after winter and before summer, in which vegetation begins to appear.

staff.definition: All the people employed by a particular organization.

stage.definition: A point, period, or step in a process or development.

stand.definition: To have or maintain an upright position, supported by one's feet.

standard.definition: A level of quality or attainment.

star.definition: A fixed luminous point in the night sky which is a large, remote incandescent body like the sun.

start.definition: To begin or be reckoned from a particular point in time or space.

state.definition: The particular condition that someone or something is in at a specific time.

statement.definition: A definite or clear expression of something in speech or writing.

station.definition: A place where a particular activity or service is based.

stay.definition: To remain in the same place.

step.definition: An act or movement of putting one foot in front of the other in walking or running.

still.definition: Not moving or making a sound.

stock.definition: The goods or merchandise kept on the premises of a business or warehouse and available for sale or distribution.

stop.definition: To come to an end; cease to happen.

store.definition: A place where things are sold.

story.definition: An account of imaginary or real people and events told for entertainment.

strategy.definition: A plan of action designed to achieve a long-term or overall aim.

street.definition: A public road in a city or town, typically with houses and buildings on one or both sides.

strong.definition: Having the power to move heavy weights or perform other physically demanding tasks.

structure.definition: The arrangement of and relations between the parts or elements of something complex.

student.definition: A person who is studying at a school or college.

study.definition: To devote time and attention to acquiring knowledge on (an academic subject), especially by means of books.

stuff.definition: Matter, material, articles, or activities of a specified or indeterminate kind.

subject.definition: A person or thing that is being discussed, described, or dealt with.

success.definition: The accomplishment of an aim or purpose.

suffer.definition: To experience or be subjected to (something bad or unpleasant).

summer.definition: The warmest season of the year, in the northern hemisphere from June to August and in the southern hemisphere from December to February.

support.definition: To bear all or part of the weight of; hold up.

sure.definition: Completely confident that one is right.

surface.definition: The outside part or uppermost layer of something.

system.definition: A set of things working together as parts of a mechanism or an interconnecting network.

table.definition: A piece of furniture with a flat top and one or more legs, providing a level surface on which objects may be placed.

take.definition: To lay hold of (something) with one's hands; reach for and hold.

talk.definition: To speak in order to give information or express ideas or feelings; converse or communicate by spoken words.

task.definition: A piece of work to be done or undertaken.

tax.definition: A compulsory contribution to state revenue, levied by the government on workers' income and business profits or added to the cost of some goods, services, and transactions.

teach.definition: To show or explain to (someone) how to do something.

teacher.definition: A person who teaches, especially in a school.

team.definition: A group of players forming one side in a competitive game or sport.

technology.definition: The application of scientific knowledge for practical purposes, especially in industry.

television.definition: A system for transmitting visual images and sound that are reproduced on screens.

tell.definition: To communicate information, facts, or news to someone in spoken or written words.

ten.definition: Equivalent to the product of two and five; one more than nine.

tend.definition: To regularly or frequently behave in a particular way or have a certain characteristic.

term.definition: A word or phrase used to describe a thing or to express a concept.

test.definition: A procedure intended to establish the quality, performance, or reliability of something.

than.definition: Introducing the second element in a comparison.

that.definition: Used to identify a specific person or thing observed by the speaker.

the.definition: Denoting one or more people or things already mentioned or assumed to be common knowledge.

their.definition: Belonging to or associated with the people or things previously mentioned or easily identified.

them.definition: Used as the object of a verb or preposition to refer to two or more people or things previously mentioned or easily identified.

themselves.definition: Used as the object of a verb or preposition to refer to a group of people or things previously mentioned as the subject of the clause.

then.definition: At that time; at the time in question.

theory.definition: A supposition or a system of ideas intended to explain something.

there.definition: In, at, or to that place or position.

they.definition: Used to refer to two or more people or things previously mentioned or easily identified.

thing.definition: An object that one need not, cannot, or does not wish to give a specific name to.

think.definition: To have a particular opinion, belief, or idea about someone or something.

third.definition: Constituting number three in a sequence; 3rd.

this.definition: Used to identify a specific person or thing close at hand or being indicated or experienced.

thought.definition: An idea or opinion produced by thinking or occurring suddenly in the mind.

thousand.definition: The number equivalent to the product of a hundred and ten.

threat.definition: A statement of an intention to inflict pain, injury, damage, or other hostile action on someone.

three.definition: Equivalent to the sum of one and two.

through.definition: Moving in one side and out of the other side of (an opening, channel, or location).

throughout.definition: In every part of (a place or object).

throw.definition: To propel (something) with force through the air by a movement of the arm and hand.

thus.definition: As a result or consequence of this; therefore.

time.definition: The indefinite continued progress of existence and events in the past, present, and future regarded as a whole.

to.definition: Expressing motion in the direction of (a particular location).

today.definition: On or in the course of this present day.

together.definition: With or in proximity to another person or people.

tonight.definition: On the present or approaching evening or night.

too.definition: To a higher degree than is desirable, permissible, or possible; excessively.

top.definition: The highest or uppermost point, part, or surface of something.

tough.definition: Strong enough to withstand adverse conditions or rough handling.

town.definition: A built-up area with a name, defined boundaries, and local government.

trade.definition: The action of buying and selling goods and services.

traditional.definition: Existing in or as part of a tradition; long-established.

training.definition: The action of teaching a person or animal a particular skill or type of behavior.

travel.definition: To make a journey, typically of some length or abroad.

treat.definition: To behave toward or deal with in a certain way.

treatment.definition: Medical care given to a patient for an illness or injury.

tree.definition: A woody perennial plant, typically having a single stem or trunk growing to a considerable height.

trial.definition: A formal examination of evidence before a judge, and typically before a jury, in order to decide guilt in a case of criminal or civil proceedings.

trip.definition: A journey or excursion, especially for pleasure.

true.definition: In accordance with fact or reality.

truth.definition: That which is true or in accordance with fact or reality.

try.definition: To make an attempt or effort to do something.

turn.definition: To move in a circular direction wholly or partly around an axis or point.

two.definition: Equivalent to the sum of one and one.

type.definition: A category of people or things having common characteristics.

understand.definition: To perceive the intended meaning of (words, a language, or a speaker).

unit.definition: An individual thing or person regarded as single and complete.

until.definition: Up to (the point in time or the event mentioned).

up.definition: Toward a higher place or position.

us.definition: Used by a speaker to refer to himself or herself and one or more other people as the object of a verb or preposition.

use.definition: To take, hold, or deploy (something) as a means of accomplishing a purpose or achieving a result; employ.

value.definition: The regard that something is held to deserve; the importance, worth, or usefulness of something.

various.definition: Different from one another; of different kinds or sorts.

victim.definition: A person harmed, injured, or killed as a result of a crime, accident, or other event or action.

view.definition: The ability to see something or to be seen from a particular place.

violence.definition: Behavior involving physical force intended to hurt, damage, or kill someone or something.

visit.definition: To go to see and spend time with (someone) socially.

voice.definition: The sound produced in a person's larynx and uttered through the mouth, as speech or song.

vote.definition: A formal indication of a choice between two or more candidates or courses of action.

wait.definition: To stay where one is or delay action until a particular time or until something else happens.

walk.definition: To move at a regular pace by lifting and setting down each foot in turn, never having both feet off the ground at once.

wall.definition: A continuous vertical brick or stone structure that encloses or divides an area of land.

want.definition: To have a desire to possess or do (something); wish for.

war.definition: A state of armed conflict between different nations or states or different groups within a nation or state.

watch.definition: To look at or observe attentively over a period of time.

water.definition: A colorless, transparent, odorless liquid that forms the seas, lakes, rivers, and rain.

way.definition: A method, style, or manner of doing something.

we.definition: Used by a speaker to refer to himself or herself and one or more other people.

weapon.definition: A thing designed or used for inflicting bodily harm or physical damage.

wear.definition: To have on one's body or a part of one's body as clothing, decoration, protection, or for some other purpose.

weigh.definition: To find out how heavy (someone or something) is, typically using scales.

well.definition: In a good or satisfactory way.

west.definition: The direction toward the point of the horizon where the sun sets at the equinoxes.

western.definition: Situated in the west, or directed toward or facing the west.

whatever.definition: It is not important what; it makes no difference what.

where.definition: In or to what place or position.

whether.definition: Expressing a doubt or choice between alternatives.

which.definition: Asking for information specifying one or more people or things from a definite set.

while.definition: During the time that; at the same time as.

white.definition: Of the color of milk or fresh snow, due to the reflection of all visible rays of light; the opposite of black.

who.definition: What or which person or people.

whom.definition: Used instead of `who` as the object of a verb or preposition.

whose.definition: Belonging to or associated with which person.

wide.definition: Of great or more than average width.

wife.definition: A married woman considered in relation to her spouse.

win.definition: To be successful or victorious in (a contest or conflict).

wind.definition: The perceptible natural movement of the air.

window.definition: An opening in the wall or roof of a a building or vehicle that is fitted with glass or other transparent material.

wish.definition: To feel or express a strong desire or hope for something that is not easily attainable.

within.definition: Inside (a place, area, or period of time).

wonder.definition: To desire or be curious to know something.

word.definition: A single distinct meaningful element of speech or writing.

work.definition: To be engaged in physical or mental activity in order to achieve a purpose or result.

worker.definition: A person who does a specified type of work or who works in a specified way.

world.definition: The earth, together with all of its countries, peoples, and natural features.

worry.definition: To feel or cause to feel anxious or troubled about actual or potential problems.

write.definition: To mark (letters, words, or other symbols) on a surface, typically paper, with a pen, pencil, or similar implement.

writer.definition: A person who has written a particular text.

yard.definition: A unit of linear measure equal to 3 feet (0.9144 m).

year.definition: The time taken by the earth to make one revolution around the sun.

yes.definition: Used to give an affirmative response.

yet.definition: Up until the present or a specified or implied time; by now or then.

you.definition: Used to refer to the person or people that the speaker is addressing.

young.definition: Having lived or existed for only a short time.

your.definition: Belonging to or associated with the person or people that the speaker is addressing.

yourself.definition: Used to refer to the person being addressed as the object of a verb or preposition when they are also the subject of the clause.
